languages.text: "Цветные осколки витража взмыли вверх, окутав магоса Ханнеймана вихрем пестрящих домыслов. Серебряный отблеск металла уже не скрывает волнения. Как и алая роба не скрывает сомнений".

traits.locale_text: "Цветные осколки витража взмыли вверх, окутав магоса Ханнеймана вихрем пестрящих домыслов. Серебряный отблеск металла уже не скрывает волнения. Как и алая роба не скрывает сомнений".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal no longer conceals his anxiety. Nor does his scarlet robe conceal his doubts."
languages.original_text: "Цветные осколки витража взмыли вверх, окутав магоса Ханнеймана вихрем пестрящих домыслов. Серебряный отблеск металла уже не скрывает волнения. Как и алая роба не скрывает сомнений".

traits.locale_text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal is no longer concealing his anxiety. Nor is his scarlet robe concealing his doubts anymore."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal is no longer concealing his anxiety. Nor is his scarlet robe concealing his doubts anymore."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal no longer conceals his anxiety. Nor does his scarlet robe conceal his doubts."

traits.locale_text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal no longer conceals his anxiety. Nor does his scarlet robe conceal his doubts."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal no longer conceals his anxiety. Nor does his scarlet robe conceal his doubts."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “五颜六色的彩色玻璃碎片升了起来，将哈努曼贤者笼罩在猜测的漩涡之中。银色的金属光泽不再能遮住他的焦虑，而他的猩红色长袍也无法再掩饰他的怀疑。”
languages.original_text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal no longer conceals his anxiety. Nor does his scarlet robe conceal his doubts."

traits.locale_text: “五颜六色的彩色玻璃碎片升了起来，将哈努曼贤者笼罩在猜测的漩涡之中。银色的金属光泽不再能遮住他的焦虑，而他的猩红色长袍也无法再掩饰他的怀疑。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal no longer conceals his anxiety. Nor does his scarlet robe conceal his doubts."

languages.text: «Los coloridos fragmentos de cristal se han levantado y rodean al magos Haneumann con un remolino de especulación. Ya no esconde su ansiedad tras el brillo plateado del metal ni sus dudas tras su túnica escarlata».
languages.original_text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal no longer conceals his anxiety. Nor does his scarlet robe conceal his doubts."

traits.locale_text: «Los coloridos fragmentos de cristal se han levantado y rodean al magos Haneumann con un remolino de especulación. Ya no esconde su ansiedad tras el brillo plateado del metal ni sus dudas tras su túnica escarlata».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ステンドグラスの色とりどりの破片が舞い上がり、マゴス・ヘニュマンを思索の渦で包み込んでいます。金属の銀色の輝きはもはや彼の不安を隠してはいません。緋色の衣も彼の疑念を隠すことはできない」
languages.original_text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal no longer conceals his anxiety. Nor does his scarlet robe conceal his doubts."

traits.locale_text: 「ステンドグラスの色とりどりの破片が舞い上がり、マゴス・ヘニュマンを思索の渦で包み込んでいます。金属の銀色の輝きはもはや彼の不安を隠してはいません。緋色の衣も彼の疑念を隠すことはできない」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Die bunten Scherben aus farbigem Glas haben sich erhoben und Magos Haneumann mit einem Wirbel von Spekulationen umgeben. Das silbrige Glitzern von Metall verbirgt seine Nervosität nicht länger. Auch seine purpurne Robe verbirgt seine Zweifel nicht länger."
languages.original_text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal no longer conceals his anxiety. Nor does his scarlet robe conceal his doubts."

traits.locale_text: "Die bunten Scherben aus farbigem Glas haben sich erhoben und Magos Haneumann mit einem Wirbel von Spekulationen umgeben. Das silbrige Glitzern von Metall verbirgt seine Nervosität nicht länger. Auch seine purpurne Robe verbirgt seine Zweifel nicht länger."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Les fragments colorés de vitrail enveloppent désormais le magos Haneumann dans un tourbillon de spéculation. L'éclat argenté du métal ne dissimule plus son anxiété et ses doutes ne sont plus cachés par sa robe écarlate. »
languages.original_text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal no longer conceals his anxiety. Nor does his scarlet robe conceal his doubts."

traits.locale_text: « Les fragments colorés de vitrail enveloppent désormais le magos Haneumann dans un tourbillon de spéculation. L'éclat argenté du métal ne dissimule plus son anxiété et ses doutes ne sont plus cachés par sa robe écarlate. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Vitrayın rengârenk parçaları havalanıp, tahminlerden oluşan bir girdap gibi Magos Haneumann'ın çevresini sarmış. Artık ne metalin gümüşi parıltısı tasalarını ne de kızıl cübbesi kuşkularını saklayabiliyor."
languages.original_text: "The colourful shards of stained glass have risen up and enveloped Magos Haneumann in a swirl of speculations. The silvery glint of metal no longer conceals his anxiety. Nor does his scarlet robe conceal his doubts."

traits.locale_text: "Vitrayin rengârenk parçaları, duyumlardan oluşan bir fırtına hâlinde Magos Haneumann'ın çevresini sarmış. Artık metalin gümüşi parıltısıyla tasalarını ya da kızıl cübbesiyle kuşkularını saklayamıyor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
